from rest_framework import serializers
from client.models.credit_certificate import CreditCertificate, FinanceProject
from client.models.user import S1User
from consts.common import DATE_FORMAT, FEN_TO_YUAN
from utils.drf.fields import FenToYuanFloatField
from utils.number_2_chinese import cncurrency
from utils.fen_and_yuan import fen_to_yuan



[文档]class CreditCertificateSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """信用凭证开立-平台审批-列表页序列化器"""

    original_open_company = serializers.CharField(source='credit.receive_company.name')  # 原始开立企业,即授信被接受企业
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source='credit.capital_company.name')  # 资金机构
    transfer_company = serializers.CharField(source='from_company.name', default='')  # 转让企业
    created_at = serializers.DateTimeField(format=DATE_FORMAT)
    s1_user = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    amount = FenToYuanFloatField()

    # status = serializers.CharField(source='get_status_display')


[文档]    def get_s1_user(self, obj):
        try:
            user = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").get(id=obj.s1_user_id)
            return user.username
        except S1User.DoesNotExist:
            return ""



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            'id',
            'number',
            'original_open_company',
            'transfer_company',
            'capital_company',
            'amount',
            'created_at',
            'promise_pay_at',
            's1_user'
        ]




[文档]class CreditApprovalDetailSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """信用凭证开立-平台审批-详情页序列化器"""

    company_credit_code = serializers.CharField(source='company.credit_code')  # 接收企业credit_code
    company = serializers.CharField(source='company.name')  # 接收企业全称
    from_company_credit_code = serializers.CharField(source='from_company.credit_code')  # 开立企业credit_code
    from_company = serializers.CharField(source='from_company.name')  # 开立企业全称
    capital_company_credit_code = serializers.CharField(source='credit.capital_company.credit_code')  # 资金机构credit_code
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source='credit.capital_company.name')  # 资金机构
    amount = FenToYuanFloatField()  # 开立金额,分->元
    credit_number = serializers.CharField(source='credit.credit_number')  # 授信编号
    created_at = serializers.DateTimeField(format=DATE_FORMAT)  # 开立申请日期
    start = serializers.DateField(source='credit.start')  # 授信开始日期
    end = serializers.DateField(source='credit.end')  # 授信结束日期
    # 接收确认时限
    credit_certificate_receive_time_limit = serializers.CharField(source='credit_certificate_receive_time_limit.name')
    # 融资年化利率
    financing_annualized_interest_rate = serializers.DecimalField(
        max_digits=10,
        decimal_places=2,
        source='credit.financing_annualized_interest_rate'
    )
    credit_certificate_enclosure = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 附件数据


[文档]    def get_credit_certificate_enclosure(self, obj):
        """信用凭证表反查附件表,拿到数据"""
        total_contract_amount = 0
        enclosure_info = dict()
        enclosure_list = []
        enclosure_objs = obj.credit_certificate_enclosures.all()
        for enclosure_obj in enclosure_objs:
            enclosure_dict = dict()
            total_contract_amount += enclosure_obj.contract_amount
            enclosure_dict['contract_amount'] = "%.2f" % (enclosure_obj.contract_amount / FEN_TO_YUAN)  # 合同金额
            enclosure_dict['contract_no'] = enclosure_obj.contract_no  # 合同编号
            enclosure_dict['contract_sign_at'] = enclosure_obj.contract_sign_at.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")  # 合同签署时间
            enclosure_dict['contract_enclosure'] = enclosure_obj.contract_enclosure  # 合同附件
            enclosure_dict['invoice_enclosure'] = enclosure_obj.invoice_enclosure  # 发票附件
            enclosure_dict['other_enclosure'] = enclosure_obj.other_enclosure  # 其他附件
            enclosure_list.append(enclosure_dict)

        enclosure_info['total_contract_amount'] = "%.2f" % (total_contract_amount / FEN_TO_YUAN)
        enclosure_info['enclosure_list'] = enclosure_list

        return enclosure_info



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            'id',
            'company_credit_code',
            'company',
            'from_company_credit_code',

            'credit_certificate_enclosure'
        ]




[文档]class FinanceApprovalSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """融资项目-平台审批-列表页序列化器"""
    finance_project_no = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 融资项目编号
    finance_company = serializers.CharField(source='company.name')  # 融资企业
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source='credit.capital_company.name')  # 资金机构
    finance_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(source='amount')  # 融资金额(元)
    financing_annualized_interest_rate = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 融资年化利率
    finance_apply_date = serializers.DateTimeField(source='updated_at', format=DATE_FORMAT)  # 融资申请日期
    applicant = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 申请人



[文档]    def get_finance_project_no(self, obj):
        """获取融资项目编号"""

        return obj.financeproject.finance_number



[文档]    def get_financing_annualized_interest_rate(self, obj):
        """获取融资年化利率"""

        return obj.financeproject.financing_annualized_interest_rate



[文档]    def get_applicant(self, obj):
        """获取申请人"""

        try:
            user = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").get(id=obj.s1_user_id)
            return user.username
        except S1User.DoesNotExist:
            return ""

[文档]class FinanceApprovalDetailSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """"融资详情页序列化器"""
    credit_company = serializers.CharField(source='credit.receive_company.name')  # 原始开立企业
    balance = serializers.SerializerMethodField()   # 信用凭证余额
    net_balance = serializers.SerializerMethodField()   # 信用凭证净额
    amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 融资金额,就是当前信用凭证的开立金额
    financing_annualized_interest_rate = serializers.DecimalField(
        source="credit.financing_annualized_interest_rate",
        max_digits=10,
        decimal_places=2
    )  # 融资年化利率(%)
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source='credit.capital_company')  # 资金机构
    company = serializers.CharField(source='company.name', default='--')  # 融资企业
    financing_annualized_interes = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 预计融资利息（元）
    technical_service = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 技术服务费（元）
    information_consultation = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 信息咨询费（元）
    certificate_type = serializers.CharField(source='business.desc_name')  # 信用凭证类型
    credit_certificate_enclosure = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 附件数据


[文档]    def get_balance(self, obj):
        """获取 信用凭证余额(单位:元)"""
        balance_value = obj.balance
        return "%.2f" % (balance_value / FEN_TO_YUAN)



[文档]    def get_net_balance(self, obj):
        """ 获取凭证净额(单位:元) """
        net_amount = obj.net_amount
        return "%.2f" % (net_amount / FEN_TO_YUAN)



[文档]    def get_amount(self, obj):
        """获取融资金额,及返回对应大写"""
        tmp_dict = dict()
        amount_yuan = "%.2f" % (obj.amount / FEN_TO_YUAN)
        tmp_dict['amount_number'] = amount_yuan
        tmp_dict['amount_str'] = cncurrency(amount_yuan)
        return tmp_dict



[文档]    def get_financing_annualized_interes(self, obj):
        """预计融资利息(单位:元)"""

        if hasattr(obj, 'financeproject'):
            financing_annualized_interest = obj.financeproject.financing_annualized_interest
            return "%.2f" % (financing_annualized_interest / FEN_TO_YUAN)
        else:
            return ""



[文档]    def get_technical_service(self, obj):
        """
        :param obj:
        :return:技术服务费(单位:元)及费率
        """
        tmp_dict = {
            "technical_service_rate": "",
            "technical_service": ""
        }
        if hasattr(obj, 'financeproject'):
            technical_service = obj.financeproject.technical_service
            tmp_dict['technical_service_rate'] = obj.financeproject.technical_service_rate
            tmp_dict['technical_service'] = "%.2f" % (technical_service / FEN_TO_YUAN)
        return tmp_dict




[文档]    def get_information_consultation(self, obj):
        """
        :param obj:
        :return:信息咨询费(单位:元)及费率
        """
        tmp_dict = {
            "information_consultation_rate": "",
            "information_consultation": ""
        }
        if hasattr(obj, 'financeproject'):

            information_consultation = obj.financeproject.information_consultation
            tmp_dict['information_consultation_rate'] = obj.financeproject.information_consultation_rate
            tmp_dict['information_consultation'] = "%.2f" % (information_consultation / FEN_TO_YUAN)
        return tmp_dict



[文档]    def get_credit_certificate_enclosure(self, obj):
        """信用凭证表反查附件表,拿到数据"""
        p_number = obj.path.pop()  # 获取当前信用凭证编号的上一级
        p_obj = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(number=p_number).first()  # 获取 父 信用凭证
        total_contract_amount = 0
        enclosure_info = dict()
        enclosure_list = []
        enclosure_objs = p_obj.credit_certificate_enclosures.all()
        for enclosure_obj in enclosure_objs:
            enclosure_dict = dict()
            total_contract_amount += enclosure_obj.contract_amount
            enclosure_dict['contract_amount'] = "%.2f" % (enclosure_obj.contract_amount / FEN_TO_YUAN)  # 合同金额
            enclosure_dict['contract_no'] = enclosure_obj.contract_no  # 合同编号
            enclosure_dict['contract_sign_at'] = enclosure_obj.contract_sign_at.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")  # 合同签署时间
            enclosure_dict['contract_enclosure'] = enclosure_obj.contract_enclosure  # 合同附件
            enclosure_dict['invoice_enclosure'] = enclosure_obj.invoice_enclosure  # 发票附件
            enclosure_dict['other_enclosure'] = enclosure_obj.other_enclosure  # 其他附件
            enclosure_list.append(enclosure_dict)

        # 开立/转让金额,开立或者转让金额 ,取当前信用凭证的上一级
        enclosure_info['open_transfer_amount'] = "%.2f" % (p_obj.amount / FEN_TO_YUAN)
        # 累积合同金额 取当前信用凭证的上一级的信用凭证的合同的累加
        enclosure_info['total_contract_amount'] = "%.2f" % (total_contract_amount / FEN_TO_YUAN)  # 累计合同金额
        enclosure_info['enclosure_list'] = enclosure_list

        return enclosure_info




[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            'id',
            'credit_company',
            'number',
            'promise_pay_at',
            'balance',
            'net_balance',

            'financing_annualized_interes',
            'technical_service',
            'information_consultation',
            'certificate_type',
            'credit_certificate_enclosure'
        ]




[文档]class FinanceProjectSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """融资管理-融资项目列表页"""

    # 融资申请日期 即 融资立项日期,去
    finance_sign_date = serializers.DateTimeField(source='sign_contract_at', format=DATE_FORMAT, default='--')
    infos = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 相关信息
    status = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 状态
    applicant = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 申请人


[文档]    def get_infos(self, obj):
        """
        返回 智信编号, 融资金额, 融资企业, 资金机构, 承诺付款日, 融资企业uid
        :param obj:
        :return:
        """
        tmp_dict = {
            'number': '--',
            'finance_quota': '--',
            'finance_company': '--',
            'finance_company_uid': '--',
            'capital_company': '--',
            'payment_date': '--',
        }

        if obj.credit_certificate:
            tmp_dict['number'] = obj.credit_certificate.number
            tmp_dict['finance_quota'] = fen_to_yuan(obj.credit_certificate.amount)
            tmp_dict['finance_company'] = obj.credit_certificate.company.name
            tmp_dict['finance_company_uid'] = obj.credit_certificate.company.uid
            tmp_dict['capital_company'] = obj.credit_certificate.credit.capital_company.name
            tmp_dict['payment_date'] = obj.credit_certificate.promise_pay_at.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
        return tmp_dict



[文档]    def get_status(self, obj):
        """
        返回状态信息
        :param obj:
        :return:
        """
        tmp_dict = {}
        tmp_dict['status'] = obj.get_status_display()
        tmp_dict['status_code'] = obj.status
        return tmp_dict



[文档]    def get_applicant(self, obj):
        """
        返回申请人信息
        :param obj:
        :return:
        """
        applicant_name = '--'
        if obj.credit_certificate:
            s1_user_id = obj.credit_certificate.s1_user_id
            s1_user = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").filter(id=s1_user_id)
            if s1_user:
                applicant_name = s1_user.first().nick_name
        return applicant_name




[文档]    class Meta:
        model = FinanceProject
        fields = [
            'id',
            'finance_number',  # 融资项目编号
            'financing_annualized_interest_rate',  # 融资年化利率
            'infos',
            'finance_sign_date',  # 融资申请日期
            'status',  # 状态
            'applicant'  # 申请人
        ]
